titleStmt.title: Reverend Alderman Atkins (the shit-breech) his speech, to Mr. Warner the venerable Mayor of London, the wise aldermen, and most judicious Common-Councell men, in relation to the present affaires in Kent, Essex, and Surrey, concerning the Scots invasion, and His Majesties interest. Published for the honour of my Lord Mayor and Common-Councell men. ...
titleStmt.author: Nedham, Marchamont, 1620-1678, attributed name.

notesStmt.note: A satire on Atkins, sometimes attributed to Marchamont Nedham.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
